content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains procedures based on receipt of supplemental service records after VA issues a decision on a claim, including
initial review of supplemental service records
required rating activity review of supplemental service records
processing service records that
require reconsideration of a prior claim
, and
do not require reconsideration of a prior claim
resolving supplemental service record deferrals
, and
rating decision language for benefits granted following receipt of supplemental service record
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Revision Based on Receipt of Supplemental Service Records
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
